amendment.description: To amend the State report card under section 1111 of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to include the rates of enrollment in postsecondary education, and remediation rates, for high schools.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2156 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2156 proposed by Senator Alexander for Senator Capito to Amendment SA 2089. (consideration: CR S5098-5104; text: CR S5103) To amend the State report card under section 1111 of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to include the rates of enrollment in postsecondary education, and remediation rates, for high schools.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2156 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2156 proposed by Senator Alexander for Senator Capito to Amendment SA 2089.
